lead_paragraph: California will recover $15 million tied to Bernard Madoff’s Ponzi scheme as part of an agreement over the estate of a Beverly Hills investment adviser.
snippet: California will recover $15 million tied to Bernard Madoff’s Ponzi scheme as part of an agreement over the estate of a Beverly Hills investment adviser....

headline.main: California Wins $15 Million From Madoff-Tied Settlement
headline.print_headline: $15 Million for California in Madoff-Tied Suit
